hero.title: Custom WhatsApp AI Automations
hero.subtitle: Connect, respond, and sell 24/7 with intelligent flows designed for your business.

problems.title: Does your business suffer from these problems?
problems.pain2: Leads slipping away due to lack of follow-up
problems.pain3: Manual handling of hundreds of conversations
problems.pain4: No integration with your CRM or database

solution.title: The Solution: Personalized WhatsApp AI
solution.subtitle: We create intelligent automations that understand your customers and handle conversations like an expert from your team.

case1.title: Customer Service
case1.description: Automatic response to FAQs, intelligent escalation to humans when needed.

case2.title: Sales Follow-up
case2.description: Automatic reminders, appointment confirmation, personalized post-sale follow-up.

case3.title: E-commerce
case3.description: Order confirmation, shipping updates, abandoned cart recovery.

case4.title: CRM Integration
case4.description: Automatic synchronization with Attio, HubSpot, Pipedrive and more. Real-time data updates.

benefit2.title: 80% less manual time
benefit2.description: Your team focuses on high-value tasks

benefit3.title: 24/7 availability
benefit3.description: Never lose a customer due to business hours

cta.title: Ready to automate your business with AI?
cta.subtitle: Join 50+ companies already selling more with automated WhatsApp.

q1.question: How long does implementation take?
q1.answer: Between 2-4 weeks depending on complexity. Includes setup, AI training, and CRM integration.

q2.question: What do I need to get started?
q2.answer: You only need a WhatsApp Business account, access to your CRM (optional), and define the flows you want to automate.

q3.question: Can I integrate my current CRM?
q3.answer: Yes, we work with all major CRMs: HubSpot, Pipedrive, Attio, Salesforce, and also custom databases.

q4.question: Can AI handle complex conversations?
q4.answer: Yes, we train the AI with your business-specific context. For very complex cases, we automatically escalate to your team.
